title: Iron Mountain (Never Summer Mountains)
text: Iron Mountain is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> <a href="summit">summit</a> in the <a href="Never%20Summer%20Mountains">Never Summer Mountains</a> of the <a href="Rocky%20Mountains">Rocky Mountains</a> of <a href="North%20America">North America</a>. The peak is located east-southeast (<a href="Absolute%20bearing">bearing</a> 114°) of the <a href="Cameron%20Pass%20%28Colorado%29">Cameron Pass</a>, <a href="Colorado">Colorado</a>, <a href="United%20States">United States</a>, on the <a href="drainage%20divide">drainage divide</a> separating <a href="State%20Forest%20State%20Park">State Forest State Park</a> and <a href="Jackson%20County%2C%20Colorado">Jackson County</a> from <a href="Roosevelt%20National%20Forest">Roosevelt National Forest</a> and <a href="Larimer%20County%2C%20Colorado">Larimer County</a>.
